CHAT.comment: ROBERT SHAW, ET AL., Petitioners v. KEVIN MURPHY
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:58 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF DAVID L. OHLER ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF PATRICIA MILLETT ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JEFFREY T. RENZ ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF DAVID L. OHLER ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 11:46 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
